Orochimaru summons a giant snake, which slams the ground with its tail, throwing the target into the air. Then, Orochimaru commands the [[Sword of Kusanagi (Orochimaru)|Sword of Kusanagi]] to stab the target.

[[es:Espada Kusanagi: Muerte de una sola Puñalada]]
[[pt-br:Espada de Kusanagi: Um Golpe Mortal]]
